tooltip.alyssa.ai_chip.desc: This prototype AI chip contains early cognitive routines.
tooltip.alyssa.ai_chip_v2.desc: Upgraded architecture with improved neural accelerators.
tooltip.alyssa.heart_core: The energy core that powers Alyssa.
tooltip.alyssa.heart_core.desc: Contains a hybrid fusion cell and adaptive neural stabilizers.
tooltip.alyssa.memory_crystal: The Memory Crystal that Alyssa remembers.
tooltip.alyssa.memory_crystal.desc: Crystallized fragment of memory. Stores data in its pure form.
tooltip.alyssa.emotion_module: The Emotion Module that Alyssa reacts to.
tooltip.alyssa.emotion_module.desc: A calibrated emotional module. Contains affective parameters and predefined reactions.
tooltip.alyssa.neural_core_fragment: A piece of The Neural Network that is Alyssa.
tooltip.alyssa.neural_core_fragment.desc: Fragment of a neural core. Small part of a larger coherent network.
tooltip.alyssa.led_iris_chip.desc: Optical chip containing drivers for complex visual patterns.
alyssa.configuration.title: Alyssa Configs
